name: Sluggish Slaughter
description:
Welcome to Sluggish Slaughter.

This game was made for the #165 Trijam, whose theme was "One Action at a time". 

Your job is to survive 5 waves of zombies. You can either move in one direction, or stand still and shoot. Your movement is quite sluggish. 

With each wave, the zombies' movement becomes less restricted, unlike yours!

At the end of each wave, you can permit yourself ONE upgrade. 

Move with the Arrow or WASD keys, and use the Left Mouse Button to shoot.

Try to get as high a score as possible!

Music by the Classified Composer.
